Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Controller.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
The Lobby class manages a game lobby where players can join, set their ready status, and configure game settings. The lobby ensures that the number of players conforms to specific limits and tracks the readiness of all players before a game can be initiated.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Lobby()
    Creates a new lobby with default settings: maxPlayers = 4 and gameType = "tutorial".
    Lobby(List<String> players, Map<String,Boolean> readyStatus)
    Creates a lobby with a predefined list of players and their ready statuses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby()
      Creates a new lobby with default settings: maxPlayers = 4 and gameType = "tutorial". Initializes empty player list and ready status map.

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(List<String> players, Map<String,Boolean> readyStatus)
      Creates a lobby with a predefined list of players and their ready statuses. Sets default game type to "tutorial".
      Parameters:
      players - list of player nicknames
      readyStatus - map of player nicknames to their ready status

  • Method Details

    • setMaxPlayers

      public void setMaxPlayers(int maxPlayers)
      Sets the maximum number of players allowed in the lobby. Must be between 2 and 4 inclusive.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if maxPlayers is not between 2 and 4

    • getMaxPlayers

      public int getMaxPlayers()
      Returns the current maximum number of players allowed in the lobby.
      Returns:
      the max players count

    • addPlayer

      public int addPlayer(String player)
      Attempts to add a player to the lobby.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player to add
      Returns:
      1 if the player was successfully added, -1 if the lobby is full, -2 if the player is already in the lobby

    • removePlayer

      public int removePlayer(String player)
      Attempts to remove a player from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player to remove
      Returns:
      1 if the player was removed, -1 if the player was not in the lobby

    • setPlayerReady

      public void setPlayerReady(String player)
      Marks the specified player as ready.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to mark ready

    • setPlayerNotReady

      public void setPlayerNotReady(String player)
      Marks the specified player as not ready.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to mark not ready

    • isLobbyFull

      public boolean isLobbyFull()
      Checks if the lobby is full.
      Returns:
      true if the number of players is equal or greater than maxPlayers, false otherwise

    • isLobbyReady

      public boolean isLobbyReady()
      Checks if the lobby is ready to start the game. The lobby is ready if it has at least 2 players, not more than maxPlayers, and all players are marked as ready.
      Returns:
      true if lobby is ready, false otherwise

    • setGameType

      public void setGameType(String gameType)
      Sets the type of the game to be played in this lobby.
      Parameters:
      gameType - the game type (e.g., "tutorial", "level2")

    • getPlayers

      public List<String> getPlayers()
      Returns a copy of the list of players currently in the lobby.
      Returns:
      a list of player nicknames

    • getReadyStatus

      public Map<String,Boolean> getReadyStatus()
      Returns a copy of the map that tracks the ready status of each player.
      Returns:
      a map from player nickname to ready status

    • getGameType

      public String getGameType()
      Returns the current game type set for the lobby.
      Returns:
      the game type string
